channel.title: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me
channel.description: I just bought the official Steam version of Black Mesa on my Windows 10 laptop, but I cannot open it up. I tried everything. I tried restarting my computer, but it wouldn't work. I tried reinstalling it, nothing. I tried verifying the intregity of my files, nope. I tried opening it by going into files and opening the bms, but I got nothing, not even when I ran as administrator. I tried going to the process section of task manager to find hl2.exe, but it isn't there. I could really use some help.

item.title: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me
item.dc:creator: lucaswilde
item.description:
Very good game, great graphics, I really want to see Oppting Force and Blue Shift added. You can find the complete Black Mesa control comands at cheatland.net. It really helps.

Read full topic

item.title: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Sarsath:

I just bought the official Steam version of Black Mesa on my Windows 10 laptop, but I cannot open it up. I tried everything. I tried restarting my computer, but it wouldn’t work. I tried reinstalling it, nothing. I tried verifying the intregity of my files, nope. I tried opening it by going into files and opening the bms, but I got nothing, not even when I ran as administrator. I tried going to the process section of task manager to find hl2.exe, but it isn’t there. I could really use some help.

item.title: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I am sorry, I am not sure I can help you. I know this is the official Black Mesa forums, however they usually hang out over at the steam forums as well as discord.

Could you perhaps post your problem there?

steamcommunity.com

Black Mesa General Discussions :: Steam Community

Black Mesa - Black Mesa is the fan-made re-imagining of Valve Software’s Half-Life. You are Gordon Freeman, a theoretical physicist at the Black Mesa Research Facility. When a routine experiment goes horribly wrong, you must fight your way through an...

item.title: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me
item.dc:creator: Sarsath
item.description:
Play, but I get nothing. Here’s how it goes: I click play. Then I say Yes to the Steam Client Service thing. Next, it performs the first time setup. Then it says running. But then, it just stops and the game won’t play.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me

item.title: I can't open up Black Mesa. Help me
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
When you open Steam and click on “Black Mesa” in your library, does the main button say “Install” or does it say “Play”?

If it says “Play” what happens when you click on it?

Read full topic
